mapper.select: SELECT CD, MEM_NNM, CONT, DT, POST_CD FROM ( SELECT PC.PL_CMT_CD AS CD, MD.MEM_NNM AS MEM_NNM, PC.PL_CMT_CONT AS CONT, PC.PL_CMT_DT AS DT, PC.PL_CD AS POST_CD FROM PLAN_COMMENT PC LEFT JOIN MEMBER_DATA MD ON PC.MEM_CD = MD.MEM_CD ) UNION ALL ( SELECT TC.TR_CMT_CD AS CD, MD.MEM_NNM AS MEM_NNM, TC.TR_CMT_CONT AS CONT, TC.TR_CMT_DT AS DT, TC.TR_CD AS POST_CD FROM TRIP_COMMENT TC LEFT JOIN MEMBER_DATA MD ON TC.MEM_CD = MD.MEM_CD ) UNION ALL ( SELECT PPC.PPC_CD AS CD, MD.MEM_NNM AS MEM_NNM, PPC.PPC_CONT AS CONT, PPC.PPC_DT AS DT, PPC.PP_CD AS POST_CD FROM PHOTO_POST_COMMENT PPC LEFT JOIN MEMBER_DATA MD ON PPC.MEM_CD = MD.MEM_CD ) ORDER BY DT DESC

SELECT SUM(A.COUNT + B.COUNT + C.COUNT) AS COUNT FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM PLAN_COMMENT ) A , ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM TRIP_COMMENT ) B , ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM PHOTO_POST_COMMENT ) C

SELECT SUM(A.COUNT + B.COUNT + C.COUNT) AS COUNT FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM PLAN_COMMENT WHERE TO_CHAR(PL_CMT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) A , ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM TRIP_COMMENT WHERE TO_CHAR(TR_CMT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) B , ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM PHOTO_POST_COMMENT WHERE TO_CHAR(PPC_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) C
